name: Attack on Reality
description:
REQUIREMENTS

  • Steam VR
  • Any PCVR headset is supported.
    Oculus Quest users must use either a cable to connect to their PC or a streaming software
  • Enough physical space around you to swing your arms without hitting anything.
  • Minimum System Requirements:
    • OS: Windows 8
    • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD R9 390
    • Memory: 4GB Ram
    • Storage: 1+ GB available space
  • A GameJolt Account (Optional used for Leaderboards)

DESCRIPTION

Attack on Reality is an accurate recreation of the popular anime/manga, Attack on Titan, in Virtual Reality.

Take control of a scout as you fly through the air with Omni-Directional Gear.

FAQ

Q: When is the next update?
A: Release dates for the next updates will be announced once ready, you can stay updated by joining the discord server.

Q: Will this game have [Insert Feature Here]
A: We plan for the game to have 3-4 major updates. The first update focuses on the player and ODM. The next two updates will focus on either Multiplayer or Titans. There will also be smaller updates/patch fixes in between these major updates mainly for bug fixes.

Q: Does the game support [Insert VR Headset name]
A: The next update will have support for any PCVR headset that SteamVR supports. This will not have support for PSVR or standalone Quest support.
Oculus Quest users need to have their Quest connected to their PC
